txt.en: 'I believe we have a much better chance at raiding Trum Dreng now!'
'Aye, I agree. Riches shall soon be ours!'
'There is a little village nearby, you see. Lhan Tarren, if our maps speak true.'
'If the doe we trapped signifies, I would guess the village is of the Stag-clan. A soft lot.'
'We would never turn away a stranger if we were in a position to help one another, you see.'
'Who is the stranger, look-out?'
'Follow me... my friends are not far.'
'An adventurer! This outsider wishes to help us, surely to reap riches from the pillaging.'
'An adventurer from foreign parts? You will indeed be a boon.'
'You will not be sorry if you travel with us! We are always going on adventures, and our wealth and power grows.'
'Doe! Tell us of your village. Where is the food? What of the warriors? Speak!'
'With this one's help, the raid on Lhan Tarren should go without complications.'
'A thousand curses upon you, outcast! You do not frighten me.'
'With this one's help, the raid on Lhan Tarren should go without complications.'
'Ha ha! The little doe does herself few favours.'
'We value strong folk here. Even duvodiad.'
'You will find us a humble band of outcasts, but we have lofty hopes for ourselves.'
'Hail, brother! I have found a warrior upon the road who wishes to join us for a time.'
'That is good tidings! This looks to be a stalwart sort of soldier.'
'Whether or not you speak up, girl, we will invade your puny village.'
'I might have spared your life, had you been more forthcoming.'
'You will find us a humble band of outcasts, but we have lofty hopes for ourselves.'
'You may question her if you wish, Duvodiad. Perhaps you will be more successful in extracting helpful information.'
'Y-you will pay for this!'
'Stranger, I beg you... you need not be part of this injustice.'
'...Cowards and fools, all of them.'
'Ah! Thank you!'
'Did I stop this time?'
'Come, let us drive out these fiends!'
'Did I listen?'
'Outcast! Now you do not catch me unaware.'
'I have to do everything myself. Come at me, if you dare!'
'A betrayer! Let this be a lesson to us: never trust duvodiad. Kill them both!'
'I am getting out of here!'
'We value strong folk here, even Duvodiad.'
